skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Bloody Reliable
skillTree.description: Although a black-hearted cutthroat of the first order, he is also notoriously a man of his word, which is also the main reason why The Directorate hired him and his pirate crew.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)
Diplomatic relations: +10 with the Empire, Kislev, Southern Realms and Bretonnia

skillTree.name: Blessing of Manann
skillTree.description: As far as the tide stretches inland, so too does the Sea God's influence.

skillTree.name: MORE GUNS!
skillTree.description: "Only 20 cannons? Are you kidding me, I need at least 60. I'm not sailing otherwise, the Albatross needs to be the greatest warship ever created."

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Extra Powder" for artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Drunken Shipmates
skillTree.description: Captain van der Kraal never sails sober. The sea goes one way, Captain van der Kraal the other. Makes the rockin' bearable.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +15% for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Sartosan Pirates
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Across the Ocean
skillTree.description: Van Der Kraal has escaped death a great many times over the years, fought against the dark-mist kindred of the Cursed Marshes and lived, raided the Norscan coast with fire and sword and it is said even survived shipwreck on the infamous Vampire Coast of Lustria and somehow returned to tell the tale.

effects.description:
Immune to High Seas attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -75% casualties suffered from high seas, reef, maelstrom and storm attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Absolutely Not a Pirate
skillTree.description: "For the last time Steven, WE ARE NOT PIRATES! We are privateers in the service of Marienburg, we have a written contract to plunder these seas, this is all legitimate business, not pirating, if I hear you questioning this again you'll walk the plank!"

effects.description: Bonus vs. Large: +12 when fighting against Vampire Coast and Rogue Armies

Leadership: +6 when fighting against Vampire Coast and Rogue Armies
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monkey Jacket
skillTree.description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"

skillTree.name: Swashbuckler
skillTree.description: If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Cutlass
skillTree.description: "Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."

skillTree.name: Hornswaggle
skillTree.description: You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Powder Monkey
skillTree.description: "Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Pyromaniac
skillTree.description: Some beings just want to see the world burn.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders missile units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Greatswords and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

effects.description:
Ward save: 7% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 11% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 15% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Voley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Avast Ye!
skillTree.description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Free Company Militia, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Pistoliers and Outriders units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: All Hands Hoay!
skillTree.description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Infamous Fleet
skillTree.description: Edvard has survived calamities and wounds uncounted, although he's lost a few bits and pieces of himself along the way.

skillTree.name: Freebooter
skillTree.description: If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Sea Dogs
skillTree.description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Go on Account
skillTree.description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Coaming & Preservative
skillTree.description: Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.

skillTree.name: Gambler's Wit
skillTree.description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Captain of the Albatross
backgroundSkills.description: Edvard Van Der Kraal is the dreaded field commander of the infamous Manann's Blades, a powerful mercenary regiment owned and operated via intermediaries of the shadowy Merchant Lords of Marienburg.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Drunken" when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Immune to High Seas attrition
	(Lord's army)
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

items.name: The Cursed Skull
items.description: One of Van Der Kraal's most precious prizes, taken from a weird temple located in Lustria. Rumours suggested it was previously occupied by a crazed female-only cult who worshipped a snake god, but those are only rumours, that can't be true..
